text:
Zapier - REMOTE - full stack engineer.

Zapier is a platform for connecting APIs via a simple UI. Most of our users don't even know what an API is. We have some really cool stuff coming this year that you can help us build.

By full stack we mean you might be replacing a core piece of the infrastructure with something more specialized yesterday, writing React.js components today and then debugging the wackiest API you've ever seen tomorrow.

We're doing hundreds of millions of API calls for users every week. We're still pretty small, so you can have huge impact, but we are also a real, growing business so you can have a secure gig.

https://zapier.com/jobs/full-stack-engineer/
